data.title: Increase Significantly the Number of Diverse Medical School Applicants and Matriculants

goals.title: sample_image
goals.text: The AAMC will be a high-performing, diverse, and inclusive organization in support of our mission.

goals.title: sample_image
goals.text: The AAMC will be the voice of academic medicine.

goals.title: sample_image
goals.text: This time in history will forever change society. The U.S. health care system will be radically altered in ways that we cannot yet fully realize.
